Choose from over 50 clearance styles eligible for this offer, including the pictured men's Adidas Crazy Chaos Sneakers that drop from $74.99 in two colors and these men's Asics Gel Torrance Trail Running Shoes in Black/White that drop from $69.99. This is the best price we found by at least $15 per pair when you buy two pairs. Please note that while the buy one, get one 50% off offer is good on all styles, the CLEARITOUT code can only be applied to clearance styles. Sales tax is charged in most states.

deals.description: Get up to 50% off refundable hotel and resort stays with these offers from Travelzoo. There are many places with discounted rates and refundable bookings. For example, we found a hotel on Madison Avenue in New York where prices fell from $199 to as low as $99 per night through 2/28/21. You can cancel your stay at least 72 hours prior to check in (though this time frame varies by location), and contact Travelzoo for a refund. Read about the risks of booking travel during 2020 in our blog post.
